text: Prowlers of the Sea is a 1928 American silent adventure film directed by John G. Adolfi and starring Carmel Myers, Ricardo Cortez and George Fawcett.Van Neste p.68 It is based on Jack London's story The Siege of the Lancashire Queen. ==Cast== * Carmel Myers as Mercedes * Ricardo Cortez as Carlos De Neve * George Fawcett as General Hernández * Gino Corrado as The Skipper * Frank Lackteen as Ramón Sánchez * Frank Leigh as Felipe * Shirley Palmer as Cuban Maid ==References== ==Bibliography== * Dan Van Neste. The Magnificent Heel: The Life and Films of Ricardo Cortez. BearManor Media, 2017. ==External links== * Category:1928 films Category:1928 adventure films Category:American films Category:American adventure films Category:Films based on works by Jack London Category:Films directed by John G. Adolfi Category:American silent feature films Category:English-language films Category:Tiffany Pictures films Category:Films set in Cuba Category:American black-and-white films
title: Prowlers of the Sea
